bug.author: simonzhaoms
bug.summary: [BUG] May add git clone in SETUP.md
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/forecasting/blob/staging/SETUP.md>SETUP.md</denchmark-link> , I think it will be clear to add before all commands: git clone https://github.com/microsoft/forecasting.git cd forecasting/ <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/simonzhaoms>@simonzhaoms</denchmark-link> Thanks a lot for testing out the repo! We will improve the repo based on your above feedback and other comments that you provided.
